item.title: ViStaCoRe: Visual Statistics Coding and Restoration
item.description: Authors: V. Laparra, J. Gutirrez, I. Epianio, G. Gmez, J. Muoz, G. Camps-Valls, and J. Malo Efficient coding of visual information and efficient inference of missing information in images depend on two factors: (1) the statistical structure of photographic images, and (2) the nature of the observer that will analyze the result. Interestingly, these two factors (image regularities and human vision) are deeply related since the evolution of biological sensors seems to be guided by statistical learning.
